name: Foggy Fox
description:
There's fog everywhere, fog and nothing else, wherever you look. This scares the fox very much, because most likely magic is involved in this... It's time for you to deal with this and return the sun to her forest!

Controls

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Speed up: Shift

Jump: Space

Interact: E 

Collect: Q 

--------------------

If you notice any errors, please let me know.
